contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Deck the Halls, Bruise Your Hand | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Relient K]] | Cover = Relient K - Deck the Halls, Bruise Your Hand.jpg | Released = {{flagicon|USA}} November 4, 2003 | Recorded = 2003 | Genre = [[Rock music|Rock]], [[holiday music|holiday]] | Length = 27:03 | Label = [[Gotee Records|Gotee]] | Producer = [[Mark Lee Townsend]] | Last album = ''[[The Vinyl Countdown]]'' <br/> (2003) | This album = '''''Deck the Halls, Bruise Your Hand''''' <br/> (2003) | Next album = ''[[Mmhmm]]'' <br/> (2004) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Jesus Freak Hideout]] | rev1Score = {{rating|5|5}}<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.jesusfreakhideout.com/cdreviews/DeckTheHallsBruiseYourHand.asp |title=Relient K, 'Deck the Halls, Bruise You Hand' Review |last1=Taylor |first1=Josh |date=12 November 2003 |publisher=Jesus Freak Hideout |accessdate=21 December 2011}} Title: sic.</ref> |rev2=[[Cross Rhythms]] |rev2Score={{rating|8|10}}<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.crossrhythms.co.uk/products/Relient_K/Deck_The_Halls_Bruise_Your_Hand/12420/ |title=Relient K - Deck The Halls Bruise Your Hand |last1=Cummings |first1=Tony |date=19 January 2005 |publisher=Cross Rhythms |accessdate=21 December 2011}}</ref>}} '''''Deck the Halls, Bruise Your Hand''''' is the first Christmas [[album]] released by [[Christian rock]] band [[Relient K]]. It was released in many stores as a combo pack with later copies of their previous full-length album, ''[[Two Lefts Don't Make a Right...but Three Do]]''. On December 5, 2006, the album reached #60 on the [[iTunes]] 100 bestselling chart. On October 23, 2007, the band re-released this album with seven new songs, and the new title of ''[[Let it Snow, Baby... Let it Reindeer]]''.<ref>http://www.relientk.com/news.aspx#10143{{dead link|date=December 2011}}</ref> ==Track listing== All tracks public domain unless otherwise noted. New verses on tracks 3 and 6 written by [[Matt Thiessen]]. #"[[Angels We Have Heard on High]]" – 1:53 #"[[Deck the Halls]]" – 1:20 #"[[The Twelve Days of Christmas (song)|12 Days of Christmas]]" – 3:30 #"[[Silent Night (song)|Silent Night]]/[[Away in a Manger]]" – 2:18 #"I Celebrate the Day" ([[Matt Thiessen]]) – 3:18 #"[[We Wish You a Merry Christmas]]" – 2:11 #"Santa Claus Is Thumbing to Town" (Thiessen) – 2:47 #"Handel's Messiah" (The Hallelujah Chorus) – 1:09 #"I Hate Christmas Parties" (Thiessen) – 4:34‡ #"[[Auld Lang Syne]]" – 4:05 (Later versions)  – 1:59) ‡Performed by [[Matthew Thiessen and the Earthquakes]] == Personnel == * [[Matt Thiessen]] – [[singing|lead vocals]], [[guitar]], [[piano]] * [[Matt Hoopes]] – guitar, [[backing vocalist|backing vocals]] * [[Brian Pittman]] – [[bass guitar|bass]] * [[Dave Douglas (drummer)|Dave Douglas]] – [[Drum kit|drums]], backing vocals == Notes == <references/> {{RelientK}} [[Category:2003 Christmas albums]] [[Category:Relient K albums]] [[Category:Gotee Records albums]]
